attributes.action: Formally recognize the part Wootton Bassett has played in the return of our troops home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: could some form of recognizion be given to the town of wootton bassett for the respect thay have given to our troops how have given there lives for there country, with out being asked have turned out for each coffin.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
